mapper.select: select a.auto_recharge_record_id id, a.petrol_num petrolNum, a.recharge_amount rechargeAmount, a.price price, a.status status, a.message message, a.recharge_time rechargeTime, a.order_time orderTime, a.create_at createAt, a.update_at updateAt, a.user_id userId, a.user_name userName, b.user_account userAccount from czb_auto_recharge_record as a LEFT JOIN czb_user as b on b.user_id = a.user_id where a.auto_recharge_record_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update czb_auto_recharge_record set petrol_num = #{petrolNum}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, message = #{message} where auto_recharge_record_id = #{id}
